title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 624.3 - Termination by trainee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 624.3 - Termination by trainee

State Regulations
A trainee who completes, or terminates without good
cause, prior to completion, training in connection with which he received a

State training, subsistence or transportation allowance, or received any such
allowance under the Federal Manpower Development and Training Act or any other

Federal Act, shall not receive a State training, subsistence or transportation
allowance for one year after such completion or termination. However, this
limitation may be waived. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
624.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
